original_text: I tell you things secretly, like people do in the dark. But you must tell people these things clearly in the light of day. I have said things very quietly into your ears. But now you must shout those things loudly from the tops of the houses.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 어두운 데서 이르는 것을 광명한 데서 말하며 너희가 귓속말로 듣는 것을 집 위에서 전파하라

sentences.original_text: like people do in the dark
But you must tell people these things clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 이것들을 분명히 사람들에게 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: I have said things very quietly
But now you must shout those things loudly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 너희는 그것들을 소리쳐 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: from the tops of the houses
